survey_name: Professional Development Needs Assessment for IT Professionals Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess the professional development needs and preferences of IT professionals to help organizations tailor their training programs effectively.

questions.question_text: What is your current role in the IT field?
questions.client_notes: Ensure that the 'Other' option includes a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your current role in the IT field?

questions.question_text: Which of the following skills do you feel you need to improve the most? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: This is a multi-select question. Limit selections to 3 options for clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes with a maximum of 3 selections allowed. Include an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following skills do you feel you need to improve the most? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How would you prefer to receive professional development training?
questions.client_notes: Consider adding follow-up questions based on the selected preferences.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How would you prefer to receive professional development training?

questions.question_text: What barriers do you face in accessing professional development opportunities?
questions.client_notes: This question helps identify common obstacles for IT professionals.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What barriers do you face in accessing professional development opportunities?

questions.question_text: Please describe any specific topics or skills you would like to see covered in future professional development programs.
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question allows respondents to provide detailed feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a textarea field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: Please describe any specific topics or skills you would like to see covered in future professional development programs.
